testcase.name: Adding dice of value 4 to an inital boardLocation updates the boardLocation to show location at position 4 in the Location array()
Adding dice of value 4 to an inital boardLocation with index set to 5 updates the boardLocation to show location at position 9 in the Location array()
Adding dice of value 4 to an inital boardLocation with index set to board size - 3 updates the boardLocation to show location at position 1 in the Location array()
Initial board location is location at position 4 if a locationIndex is given to the constructor()
Initial board has hasPassedGo set correctly depending on locationIndex sent to the constructor()
